sen.j: 新美 卯一郎（にいみ ういちろう、1879年1月12日 - 1911年1月24日）は明治の社会主義者。
sen.e: Uichiro NIIMI (January 12, 1879 - January 24, 1911) is a known socialist of Meiji Period.
Uichiro NIIMI (January 12, 1879 - January 24, 1911) was a socialist of the Meiji Period.
sen.cmt: is→was としました。known を削除しました。Meiji の前に the を追加しました。
sen.e: Uichiro NIIMI (January 12, 1879 - January 24, 1911) was a socialist of the Meiji Period.

sen.j: 幸徳事件で処刑された12名の1人。
sen.e: He is one of the 12 convicts of those who were executed for Kotoku Incident.
He is one of the 12 convicts of those who were executed for Kotoku Incident.
He is one of the 12 convicts of those who were executed for Kotoku Incident.
Brief Personal History
Brief Personal History
Brief Personal History
He was born in Kumamoto Prefecture.
He was born in Kumamoto Prefecture.
He was born in Kumamoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 熊本県立済々黌高等学校卒業。
sen.e: He graduated from Kumamoto Prefectural Seiseiko High School.
He graduated from Kumamoto Prefectural Seiseiko High School.
He graduated from Kumamoto Prefectural Seiseiko High School.
He dropped out of Tokyo Senmon Gakko. (Tokyo Vocational College)
He dropped out of Tokyo Senmon Gakko (Tokyo Vocational College).
sen.cmt: ピリオドの位置を括弧の後ろに移動しました。
sen.e: He dropped out of Tokyo Senmon Gakko (Tokyo Vocational College).

sen.j: 1907年松尾卯一太と『熊本評論』創刊。
sen.e: He started publishing "Kumamoto Hyoron" ("Kumamoto Review") in 1907 with Uitta MATSUO.
He started publishing "Kumamoto Hyoron" (Kumamoto Review) in 1907 with Uitta MATSUO.
sen.cmt: 括弧内の引用符を削除しました。
sen.e: He started publishing "Kumamoto Hyoron" (Kumamoto Review) in 1907 with Uitta MATSUO.

sen.j: 宮崎民蔵（1865年 - 1928年、宮崎滔天の次兄）によって組織されていた土地復権同志会に紙面を提供する。
sen.e: He provided the editorial space for the Land Reinstatement Comrade Organization formed by Tamizo MIYAZAKI (1865 - 1928, the second elder brother of Toten MIYAZAKI)
He provided newspaper space for the Land Reinstatement Comrade Organization formed by Tamizo MIYAZAKI (1865 - 1928, the second elder brother of Toten MIYAZAKI).
sen.cmt: ピリオドを追加しました。
sen.e: He provided newspaper space for the Land Reinstatement Comrade Organization formed by Tamizo MIYAZAKI (1865 - 1928, the second elder brother of Toten MIYAZAKI).

sen.j: 1910年の幸徳事件で検挙され、1911年1月24日午前8時55分東京監獄にて絞首刑執行。
sen.e: He was arrested for Kotoku Incident in 1910, his death penalty by hanging was carried out at Tokyo Prison on January 24, 1911, at 8:55 AM.
He was arrested for Kotoku Incident in 1910, and his death penalty by hanging was carried out at Tokyo Prison on January 24, 1911, at 8:55 AM.
He was arrested for Kotoku Incident in 1910, and his death penalty by hanging was carried out at Tokyo Prison on January 24, 1911, at 8:55 AM.
His age at death was 32.
Died at the age of 32.
sen.cmt: 用語統一の表記に変更しました。
sen.e: Died at the age of 32.
